curam.util.client.path.resolver

Class AbstractClientResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.util.common.plugin.AbstractPlugIn
      • curam.util.common.path.AbstractPathResolverPlugIn
        • curam.util.client.path.resolver.AbstractClientResolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    curam.util.client.model.ApplicationResourceContext, curam.util.client.model.BOPIContext, curam.util.client.model.CodeTableContext, Context, curam.util.client.model.PageContext, curam.util.client.model.RequestParametersContext, curam.util.client.model.RequestPathInfoContext, curam.util.client.model.ScopedAttributesContext, curam.util.client.model.UserPreferencesContext, curam.util.client.path.ClientPathResolverPlugIn, PathResolver, curam.util.common.path.PathResolverPlugIn, PlugIn

    public abstract class AbstractClientResolver
extends curam.util.common.path.AbstractPathResolverPlugIn
implements curam.util.client.path.ClientPathResolverPlugIn
    An abstract base class for client path resolvers that provides access to the current request object's parameters and BOPI instances. Only client path resolvers that need to access the parameters or BOPI instances should be derived from this class; for simpler resolvers, the curam.util.common.path.AbstractPathResolverPlugIn or curam.util.common.path.resolver.AbstractSimpleResolver classes should be used.

      • fail

        protected void fail(Path path)
             throws DataAccessException
        Throws an exception reporting that the path resolution failed because the path could not be interpreted as expected.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to report. This may be null.
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - Always thrown.

      • fail

        protected void fail(Path path,
                    java.lang.Throwable cause)
             throws DataAccessException
        Throws an exception reporting that the path resolution failed because the path could not be interpreted as expected. The cause of the failure can be specified.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to report. This may be null.
        cause - The cause of the failure. This will be chained to the exception that is thrown.
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - Always thrown.

      • checkNullPath

        protected void checkNullPath(Path path)
                      throws DataAccessException
        Checks if the path is null and throws an exception if it is. This can be called if the use of a null path is likely to represent a bug.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to be checked.
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - If the path is null.

      • assertEmptyStringPredicate

        protected void assertEmptyStringPredicate(java.lang.Object predicate,
                                          Path path)
                                   throws DataAccessException
        Asserts that a predicate is an empty string. Throws an exception if the predicate is null, or is not a String, or is a String but is not empty. Whitespace is not stripped and is counted as non-empty.
        Parameters:
        predicate - The predicate object to be checked.
        path - The path to identify in any reported error.
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - If the predicate is not an empty string.

      • assertNonEmptyStringPredicate

        protected void assertNonEmptyStringPredicate(java.lang.Object predicate,
                                             Path path)
                                      throws DataAccessException
        Asserts that a predicate is a string that is not empty. Throws an exception if the predicate is null, or is not a String, or is a String but is empty. Whitespace is not stripped and is counted as non-empty.
        Parameters:
        predicate - The predicate object to be checked.
        path - The path to identify in any reported error.
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - If the predicate is not a non-empty string.

      • getFilteringContext

        protected java.lang.String getFilteringContext()
        Gets the current filtering context parameter value from the session.
        Returns:
        the filtering context value or null if the filtering context wasn't set up or was reset.
